TEI.2.document_title: Washington Hotel to Stephen F Austin, 08-22-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with Washington Hotel, Mexico, August 22. 1833. Bill.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1002

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with Washington Hotel, Mexico, August 22. 1833. Bill.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p* To *location_mentioned*Washington Hotel */location_mentioned* Dr.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-16-1833">July 16*/date_mentioned* To Cash pd postage of a letter__________$0. 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-23-1833">23 */date_mentioned* " 1 Bot Madiera______________2 4*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-23-1833">"*/date_mentioned* 1 Glass brandy_________ 0 1*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-23-1833">"*/date_mentioned* 1 do do--________ 0 1*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-29-1833">29 */date_mentioned* 1 Bot Ale____________ " 3*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-29-1833">" */date_mentioned* Rent of room No. 2 from *date_mentioned n="07-19-1833">July 19th*/date_mentioned*-*date_mentioned n="07-23-1833">23d*/date_mentioned* is 5 ,days@ 6 1/2 Rs__________ 4. 01/2*/p*
*p*Rent of front Sala from *date_mentioned n="07-24-1833">24th */date_mentioned*to *date_mentioned n="07-31-1833">31 July*/date_mentioned* is 8 days@$l is______________________ 8. 0*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-29-1833">" */date_mentioned* Board from *date_mentioned n="07-19-1833">July 19th */date_mentioned*to*date_mentioned n="07-31-1833"> 31st*/date_mentioned* is 13 days@$9 per week- $16. 5 3/4*/p*
*p* *date_mentioned n="07-29-1833">"*/date_mentioned* 2 Glasses Spts (26)___ " 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-29-1833">"*/date_mentioned* 6 Segars (27)_______________ " 1*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-29-1833">" */date_mentioned*1 glass (28)_________ " 1*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-29-1833">"*/date_mentioned* 1 do 29______________" 1*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-30-1833">30 */date_mentioned* 1 do ___________ 1*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-31-1833">31*/date_mentioned* 1 do _______________ 1*/p*
*p*$33. 11 1/4*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-04-1833">Augt 4*/date_mentioned* To 1 Glass brandy_________________ " 1*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-05-1833">5 */date_mentioned* " 1 do do_______________ " 1*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-06-1833">6*/date_mentioned* "1 do do__________________ " 1*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-08-1833">8*/date_mentioned* " 1 do do____________________ " 1*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-09-1833">9*/date_mentioned* " 1 do punch______________ " 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-12-1833">12*/date_mentioned* 1 Bot brandy___________________ 1 4*/p*
*p*1 Glass do __________________________ " 1*/p*
*p*1 do do ___________________ " 1*/p*
*p*Amt carried over— ____________ $35. 4 1/4*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1833">1833*/date_mentioned* To Amt brot over__________________ $35. 4 1/4*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-12-1833">Augt 12*/date_mentioned* To Brandy Sling____________________________ " 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-12-1833">"*/date_mentioned* " 1 Glassbrandy______________________ " 1*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-13-1833">13*/date_mentioned* " 1 do do ______ " 1*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-16-1833">16*/date_mentioned* " 1 mint Sling________________ " 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-19-1833">19 */date_mentioned* " 1 Glass brandy____________________ " 1*/p*

*p**date_mentioned n="08-22-1833">22*/date_mentioned* " 1 Mint Sling_________________________ " 2*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-22-1833">" */date_mentioned* " Board from *date_mentioned n="08-01-1833">1st Inst*/date_mentioned* to *date_mentioned n="08-21-1833">21st */date_mentioned*inclusive is 3 weeks@$9-- 27*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-22-1833">" */date_mentioned* Lodging and lights from *date_mentioned n="08-13-1833">13th*/date_mentioned* to *date_mentioned n="08-21-1833">21st*/date_mentioned* is 9 days 6 1/2____ 7 2 1/2*/p*
*p*$71. 0 3/4*/p*
*p*Recd, this above in full *location_mentioned*Mixico */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="08-22-1833">Augt. 22d 1833*/date_mentioned**/p*
